DataElement.preferredName: Manufacture Cellular Therapy Out of Specification Product Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the manufactured cellular therapy product was out of specification.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Manufacture Cellular Therapy Out of Specification Product
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of making something (a product) from raw materials._Utilization of specific cells, modified or not, for treatment of diseases. Donor lymphocyte infusion is a type of cellular therapy._Test results for a product or drug that do not meet the predetermined specification criteria set by the manufacturer._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
